text.value: _Be sure you submit to complete this action._
Height has to be greater than 0!
Date cannot be in the past!
What visit would you like to confirm?
Date cannot be in the future!
Weight has to be greater than 0!
Tsatanetsatane wa ulendo wa mphumu/matenda a m'mapapo
Tsatanetsatane wa ulendo wa matenda a Shuga/Kuthamanga kwa magazi
Tsiku lina loti apite ku chipatala:
Tsatanetsatane wa ulendo wa matenda a mu ubongo
Tsiku lina loti apite ku chipatala

bind.calculate: if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=1 and selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit , 'ncd'), 'NCD', if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=1 and selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit , 'art'), 'ART', if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=2, 'ART and NCD', '')))

if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=1 and selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit , 'ncd'), 'NCD', if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=1 and selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit , 'art'), 'ART', if(count-selected( /visit_verification/visit_details/visit )=2, 'ART ndi NCD', '')))
